Text: The Zambia Mining and Environmental Remediation and Improvement Project also includes plans for testing and treating at least 10,000 children, pregnant women, mothers, and other individuals, which will be overseen by the District Medical Officer in Kabwe.
Cause: The Zambia Mining and Environmental Remediation and Improvement Project
Effect: plans for testing and treating at least 10,000 children, pregnant women, mothers, and other individuals, which will be overseen by the District Medical Officer in Kabwe.
Sentence: <e1>The Zambia Mining and Environmental Remediation and Improvement Project</e1> also includes <e2>plans for testing and treating at least 10,000 children, pregnant women, mothers, and other individuals, which will be overseen by the District Medical Officer in Kabwe.</e2>
